name: block_number
description: The block number

name: block_hash
description: Hash of the block

name: block_parent_hash
description: Hash of the parent block

name: block_nonce
description: Hash of the generated proof-of-work

name: block_sha3_uncles
description: SHA3 of the uncles data in the block

name: block_logs_bloom
description: The bloom filter for the logs of the block. null when its pending block

name: block_transactions_root
description: The root of the transaction trie of the block

name: block_state_root
description: The root of the final state trie of the block

name: block_miner
description: The address of the beneficiary to whom the mining rewards were given

name: block_difficulty
description: Integer of the difficulty for this block

name: block_total_difficulty
description: Integer of the total difficulty of the chain until this block

name: block_size
description: The size of this block in bytes

name: block_extra_data
description: The extra data field of this block

name: block_gas_limit
description: The maximum gas allowed in this block

name: block_gas_used
description: The total used gas by all transactions in this block

name: block_timestamp
description: The unix timestamp for when the block was collated

name: block_timestamp_partition
description: The timestamp for when the block was collated

name: block_transaction_count
description: The number of transactions in the block

name: tx_hash
description: Hash of the transaction

name: tx_nonce
description: The number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one

name: tx_index
description: Integer of the transactions index position in the block. null when its pending

name: tx_from
description: Address of the sender

name: tx_to
description: Address of the receiver. null when its a contract creation transaction

name: tx_value
description: Value transferred in Wei

name: tx_gas
description: Gas provided by the sender

name: tx_gas_price
description: Gas price provided by the sender in Wei

name: tx_input
description: The data send along with the transaction

name: receipt_cumulative_gas_used
description: The total amount of gas used when this transaction was executed in the block

name: receipt_gas_used
description: The amount of gas used by this specific transaction alone

name: receipt_contract_address
description: The contract address created, if the transaction was a contract creation, otherwise null

name: receipt_root
description: 32 bytes of post-transaction stateroot (pre Byzantium)

name: receipt_status
description: Either 1 (success) or 0 (failure)
